chunk-6c59374ebd57c4cadd215ce86b60a88c.description: A fitness instructor aged 26, who was working at the Tribe of Nova gathering festival and experienced the attack firsthand. She is also referred to as Ms. Fakliro in the text.

A trance music festival celebrating the Jewish holiday of Sukkot, which was disrupted by an attack from Hamas. The event took place only three miles from Gaza and resulted in a massacre, turning a carefree environment into a scene of panic and violence.
